column5: On one of these scrolling ads, I saw an ad for Clark's resort and clicked on it. It says they are on Cedar Lake, north of Vermillion Bay. Is this the same place that years ago was called Wogenstahl's Campground? If I remember correctly, this is located somewhere around the Camp Robinson Road.
I don't know the history of what it was called, but I do know that Clark's is located off of Camp Robinson road. In terms of the lake, it is on the southern edge of the western arm of Cedar Lake.
yes, it used to be Wogenstahls...

I have been to the Clark's Northern Lights on Cedar Lake. They have a great camp, and do a great job of trying to make customers happy. The nice thing is that they supply bait free, with your package.
